General.Name: Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited
General.Description: Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes steel wire products primarily in Thailand. The company offers pre-stressed concrete wires for use in the production of piles, electricity poles, finished floor slabs, and concrete railroad tiles; pre-stressed concrete strand wires that are used in construction works, including bridge beams, elevated roads, large-sized piles, and silos; and welding wires for various applications in metal welding industries, such as motorcar assembling and parts, shipbuilding docks, containers, water pump ducts, gas tanks, wheel ploughs, power transformers, and furniture. It also provides hard drawn wires, such as spring wire for use in mattress, auto parts, wire mesh, and spring industries; low carbon steel wires, which are used in piling industry, electricity posts, and drains; and wire mesh products used in the construction of roads, buildings, and finished walls. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited.
General.Address: No.1011 Supalai Grand Tower, Bangkok, Thailand, 10120
